Technically, the difference between these two modes is:
mode doesn’t change the pivot based on the mouse position. Since the default tumble pivot is at the origin, and
the pivot moves with you when you track the view, this has the effect of tumbling around the center of the view.

mode (the default) sets the pivot if you start tumbling over geometry. This tumbles around the geometry point the mouse was over. If you click in empty space, tumbling centers around the previous pivot.
